Appetizers.name: Paneer Tikka Quesadilla
Appetizers.description: A fusion of Mexican quesadilla and Indian paneer tikka, served with mint chutney.

Appetizers.name: Tandoori Momos
Appetizers.description: Steamed momos marinated in tandoori spices and grilled to perfection.

Appetizers.name: Dal Makhani Arancini
Appetizers.description: Crispy rice balls stuffed with creamy dal makhani, served with a spicy tomato dip.

Appetizers.name: Vada Pav Sliders
Appetizers.description: Mini vada pavs served with spicy garlic chutney and fried green chilies.

Main Course.name: Butter Chicken Pizza
Main Course.description: Classic butter chicken served on a thin crust pizza base, topped with mozzarella cheese.

Main Course.name: Masala Pasta
Main Course.description: Pasta cooked with Indian spices and herbs, mixed with vegetables and topped with cheese.

Main Course.name: Pav Bhaji Fondue
Main Course.description: A twist on the traditional pav bhaji, served as a fondue with bread cubes.

Main Course.name: Biryani Burrito
Main Course.description: A burrito filled with fragrant biryani rice, tender chicken pieces, and mint chutney.

Main Course.name: Chole Bhature Tacos
Main Course.description: Tacos filled with spicy chole and topped with pickled onions, served with a side of bhature.

Main Course.name: Paneer Butter Masala Fries
Main Course.description: French fries topped with rich paneer butter masala and drizzled with cheese sauce.

Main Course.name: Schezwan Dosa
Main Course.description: A crispy dosa filled with spicy Schezwan sauce and vegetables, served with coconut chutney.

Main Course.name: Aloo Tikki Burger
Main Course.description: A burger with a spicy aloo tikki patty, lettuce, tomato, and mint mayo.

Main Course.name: Kadai Paneer Wrap
Main Course.description: A wrap filled with kadai paneer, onions, bell peppers, and a tangy yogurt sauce.

Main Course.name: Chicken Tikka Mac and Cheese
Main Course.description: Macaroni in a creamy cheese sauce with chunks of spicy chicken tikka.

Desserts.name: Rasgulla Cheesecake
Desserts.description: A fusion dessert with layers of cheesecake and traditional rasgulla.

Beverages.name: Thandai Shake
Beverages.description: A refreshing milkshake flavored with thandai and topped with nuts.

Beverages.name: Paan Mojito
Beverages.description: A refreshing mojito with the flavors of paan, mint, and lime.
